credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
dimensions:
Sheet: 35.5 x 53 cm (14 x 20 7/8 in.)
Frame H x W x D: 60 x 75.6 cm (23 5/8 x 29 3/4 in.)
title: Mountain River or Lake
medium: Black chalk, graphite, brush and black and gray -blue wash on white watercolor paper.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a sloping hill with man, seen from behind, seated on two fallen pine tree trunks and also framed by two live pine trees in center foreground, before a vista filled by a mountain river (or lake) surrounded by hills covered with burned trees. 

Verso: Patches of various colors.
name: Drawing
